page.title: 14WALPOLE PARK
page.content: Money needs to be spent on small companies to help them to expand. The new shopping centre could create competition and some existing shops would not survive. Would large stores be interested?' 'I would like to see Gosport developed and in such a way as to encourage trade and employment but not at the expense of part of{Walpole Park.' { }We know that not all of Gosport's residents share these views. Some feel that a development of the kind proposed can only bring with it many advantages of jobs, tourism and increased trade. However, it is our playing space and we want to preserve it for the future. compiled by Ben Sinclair Mark Campion aged 9 years
